verses.verse: Yet now <S%H8085>hear<s%>, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3335>thee<s%>, and formed thee from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, who will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3372>thee<s%>: Fear <S%H3290>not<s%>, O Jacob my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and <S%H3484>thou<s%>, Jeshurun, whom I have <S%H977>chosen<s%>.

For I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> upon him that is <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, and <S%H5140>streams<s%> upon the dry <S%H3004>ground<s%>; I will <S%H3332>pour<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> upon thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon thine <S%H6631>offspring<s%>:
and they shall spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H2682>grass<s%>, as <S%H6155>willows<s%> by <S%H4325>the<s%> <S%H2988>watercourses<s%>.

One shall <S%H559>say<s%>, I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s; and another shall <S%H7121>call<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and another shall <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H3655>surname<s%> himself by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: I am the <S%H7223>first<s%>, and I am the <S%H314>last<s%>; and <S%H1107>besides<s%> me there is no <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H7121>who<s%>, as I, shall call, and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H6186>it<s%>, and set it in order for <S%H7760>me<s%>, since I established the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>? and the things that are <S%H857>coming<s%>, and that shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5046>pass<s%>, let them declare.

Fear <S%H6342><s%> ye <S%H7297>not<s%>, neither be afraid: have I not <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto thee of <S%H227>old<s%>, and <S%H8085>showed<s%> <S%H5707>it<s%>? and ye are my witnesses. Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H6697>me<s%>? yea, there is no Rock; I know not <S%H3045>any<s%>.

They that <S%H3335>fashion<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%> are all of them <S%H8414>vanity<s%>; and the <S%H2530>things<s%> that they delight in shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%>; and their own <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3045>not<s%>, nor know: that they may be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
Who hath <S%H3335>fashioned<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, or <S%H5258>molten<s%> an <S%H6459>image<s%> that is <S%H3276>profitable<s%> for <S%H1115>nothing<s%>?

Behold <S%H2270><s%>, all his fellows shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>; and the <S%H2796>workmen<s%>, they are of <S%H120>men<s%>: let them all be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%>, let them stand <S%H5975>up<s%>; they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%>, they shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

The <S%H1270>smith<s%> maketh an <S%H4621>axe<s%>, and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> in the <S%H6352>coals<s%>, and <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> it with <S%H4717>hammers<s%>, and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> it with his <S%H3581>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>: <S%H7457>yea<s%>, he is hungry, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H369>faileth<s%>; he <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>, and is <S%H3286>faint<s%>.

The <S%H2796>carpenter<s%> stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> a <S%H8279>line<s%>; he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with a <S%H8279>pencil<s%>; he <S%H6213>shapeth<s%> it with <S%H4741>planes<s%>, and he marketh it <S%H8388>out<s%> with the <S%H4230>compasses<s%>, and <S%H6213>shapeth<s%> it after the <S%H8403>figure<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>, according to the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%>.

He heweth him <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and <S%H3947>taketh<s%> the <S%H8645>holm-tree<s%> and the <S%H437>oak<s%>, and <S%H553>strengtheneth<s%> for himself one among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>: he <S%H5193>planteth<s%> a <S%H766>fir-tree<s%>, and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> doth nourish <S%H1431>it<s%>.

Then shall it be for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H1197>burn<s%>; and he <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H2552>thereof<s%>, and warmeth <S%H5400>himself<s%>; yea, he kindleth <S%H644>it<s%>, and baketh <S%H3899>bread<s%>: <S%H6466>yea<s%>, he maketh a <S%H410>god<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshippeth<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>; he maketh it a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and falleth down <S%H5456>thereto<s%>.

He <S%H8313>burneth<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; with <S%H2677>part<s%> thereof he <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; he <S%H6740>roasteth<s%> <S%H6748>roast<s%>, and is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>; <S%H2552>yea<s%>, he warmeth <S%H559>himself<s%>, and saith, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, I am <S%H2552>warm<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H217>fire<s%>.

And the <S%H7611>residue<s%> thereof he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> a <S%H410>god<s%>, even his graven <S%H6459>image<s%>; he falleth <S%H5456>down<s%> unto it and <S%H7812>worshippeth<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> unto <S%H559>it<s%>, and saith, <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> <S%H410>me<s%>; for thou art my god.

They <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H995>not<s%>, neither do they consider: for he hath <S%H2902>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7200>see<s%>; and their <S%H3826>hearts<s%>, that they cannot <S%H7919>understand<s%>.

And none <S%H7725>calleth<s%> to <S%H3820>mind<s%>, neither is there <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H2677>part<s%> of it <S%H1119>in<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>; <S%H644>yea<s%>, also I have baked <S%H3899>bread<s%> upon the <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H6740>thereof<s%>; I have roasted <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>: and shall I make the <S%H3499>residue<s%> thereof an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>? shall I fall <S%H5456>down<s%> to the <S%H944>stock<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%>?

He <S%H7462>feedeth<s%> on <S%H665>ashes<s%>; a <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath turned him <S%H5186>aside<s%>; and he cannot <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, nor <S%H559>say<s%>, Is there not a <S%H8267>lie<s%> in my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> these <S%H3290>things<s%>, O Jacob, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for thou art my <S%H5650>servant<s%>: I have <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H5650>thee<s%>; thou art my servant: O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou shalt not be forgotten of <S%H5382>me<s%>.

I have blotted <S%H4229>out<s%>, as a thick <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, thy <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, <S%H6051>and<s%>, as a cloud, thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>: <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H1350>me<s%>; for I have redeemed thee.

Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7321>it<s%>; shout, ye lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, O <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and every <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H3068>therein<s%>: for Jehovah hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> himself in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
